original_text: Whoever has will be given more; whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.”
korean_text: 있는 자는 받을 것이요 없는 자는 그 있는 것까지도 빼앗기리라

sentences.original_text: Whoever has will be given more
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇이든 있는 자는 더 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: even what they have will be taken from them
